1. You will NOT have to use the "Build Tab" in Rstudio
2. On Github, Settings -> Pages -> Branch:Main -> root 
3. On computer, in docs, make a copy of rmd / html and rename them to index (no caps)
4. If webpage does not update, you may have to un-link it and re-link
